who freely chooses to create an effect in time without any prior determining
conditions. And, thus, we are brought, not merely to the transcendent cause
of the universe, but to its personal Creator.
Isn’t it incredible that the Big Bang theory thus fits in with what the Chris-
tian theist has always believed: that in the beginning God created the uni-
verse? Now I put it to you, which do you think makes more sense: that the
Christian theist is right or that the univer
